text: Tara pichata duyo akau yoraa arambha karaile, arasesata yetiya te'omloka eta janapadara adhibasisakalara ocarata upasthita ha’la, tetiya sihamtara ocarata khadya bicaraile; kintu sihamte te'omlokara atithya karaibalai asbikara karaile. Tara pichata te'omloke tata ekhana praacira dekha pale, yito bagarai yoraara upakrama haichila, tetiya te'om se'itoka sudrrha karai dile. Mucha'i ka’le, ‘arasye apuni iccha karaile iyara babe paraisramika grahana karaiba parailehemtena’
